bundle_tag.description: [string]The loadout package will be generated with this bundle tag. Has no runtime effect.

package.description: [package]The loadout package to laod for this entity.

audio_resource.description: [wwise_dep]The wwise bank to include in the package for this entity.

include_default_customizations.description: [bool]If set any default customizations are included in the package generated for this .adhd file. Affects the entire package
